Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.backend.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudService<User>, FilterableCrudService<User>
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements FilterableCrudService<User>
Service class for managing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on User entities.

This service implements specific business validations such as preventing modification of locked users and self-deletion protection.

The service provides comprehensive user management functionality including:

  • Multi-field search across user properties (email, names, role)
  • User account security validations
  • Prevention of unauthorized operations
  • Pagination and filtering support

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

    • save

      public User save(User currentUser, User entity)
      Saves the provided User entity. Throws an exception if the user is locked.
      Specified by:
      save in interface CrudService<User>
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the operation (for security validations)
      entity - the user to be saved or updated
      Returns:
      the saved user
      Throws:
      UserFriendlyDataException - if the user is locked

    • delete

      @Transactional public void delete(User currentUser, User userToDelete)
      Deletes the specified user. Throws an exception if the user to delete is the current user or if the user to delete is locked.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface CrudService<User>
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the operation (admin, etc.)
      userToDelete - the user to be deleted
      Throws:
      UserFriendlyDataException - if attempting self-deletion or if the user is locked
